audio_file: Relay the message Ma Teresa Malavega Marisa Andoy 617819523904 010325.wav

transcription.text: Magandang hapon, pwede po ba kayo Mr. Arjan na simpo?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ano naman siya dito? Kaya akin sarupon siya eh.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay, kayo po kasi naka-declare dito as emergency contact. Bali, hindi na po kayo connected sa kanya, ma'am?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hindi na po kayo connected sa kanya?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hindi po. Kinala ko lang siya.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Wala po ba kayong number na pwedeng tawagan si Mr. Arjan?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ma'am, nawala kasi yung sarupon niya.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Hindi na po kayo connected sa kanya, ma'am?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Kasi, nang nakaraan, may tumawag sa akin. Noong December. Ano, minissage ko siya. Eh, hindi niya nanasisin. Nalaman ko, wala na yung sa ipin niya na wala daw. Kinuha.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Hindi na po kayo connected sa kanya, ma'am?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Opo. Opo. Wala pa ako. Ano sa kayo, magpuntas na eh. Tagal na kasi yun. Magbawa. Ano ba kasi yan?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay, ma'am? Okay, sige. Maraming salamat, ma'am Marisa. Have a great day, ma'am. Thank you.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Kaya gilip po. Kaya gilip po. Ano ba? Ano ba? Ano ba? Ano ba? Ano ba?
transcription.speaker: spk1

translation.tagalog: Magandang hapon, pwede po ba kayo Mr. Arjan na simpo?
Ano naman siya dito? Kaya akin sarupon siya eh.
Okay, kayo po kasi naka-declare dito as emergency contact. Bali, hindi na po kayo connected sa kanya, ma'am?
translation.english: I'm sure you've already made contact with the emergency services, but you're not going to be able to contact them, are you?

translation.tagalog: Hindi na po kayo connected sa kanya?
translation.english: Aren't you connected to him anymore?

translation.tagalog: Hindi po. Kinala ko lang siya.
Wala po ba kayong number na pwedeng tawagan si Mr. Arjan?
translation.english: Don't you have a number to call Mr. Arjan?

translation.tagalog: Ma'am, nawala kasi yung sarupon niya.
translation.english: "Mom, I think I lost my scarf."

translation.tagalog: Hindi na po kayo connected sa kanya, ma'am?
translation.english: You're not connected to him anymore, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Kasi, nang nakaraan, may tumawag sa akin. Noong December. Ano, minissage ko siya. Eh, hindi niya nanasisin. Nalaman ko, wala na yung sa ipin niya na wala daw. Kinuha.
translation.english: I've been told that in the past, I've been called in December. What, I've been calling him. Uh, he didn't feel it. I know, there's nothing in his file that he didn't like.

translation.tagalog: Hindi na po kayo connected sa kanya, ma'am?
translation.english: You're not connected to him anymore, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Opo. Opo. Wala pa ako. Ano sa kayo, magpuntas na eh. Tagal na kasi yun. Magbawa. Ano ba kasi yan?
translation.english: I'm not sure, I'm not sure, I'm not sure, I'm not sure, I'm not sure, I'm not sure, I'm not sure.

translation.tagalog: Okay, ma'am? Okay, sige. Maraming salamat, ma'am Marisa. Have a great day, ma'am. Thank you.
translation.english: Thank you very much, Marissa, have a great day.

translation.tagalog: Kaya gilip po. Kaya gilip po. Ano ba? Ano ba? Ano ba? Ano ba? Ano ba?
translation.english: So it's a slippery slope. So it's a slippery slope. What is it? What is it? What is it?
